name: Hanoi iPhoto tour
description: Explore Hanoi’s iconic spots and hidden backstreets while learning how to take great pictures with your iPhone.  We start at St Joseph’s Cathedral and Hoan Kiem Lake, then wander through the bustling streets of the Old Quarter, focusing on three main kinds of iPhone photo – landscape, relationship and detail.  Over coffee, we have a brief tutorial on editing in Instagram, and finish with a look at how to take the perfect selfie!
